tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned conditional status on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica with a T11 finish at the Bogota, Colombia Q-School. Lost a sudden death playoff to Xander McDonald-Smith for a spot that secured exempt status for the first half of the Latin American season.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Only start of the year on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica was a missed the cut at the Ecuador Open in September.

2014: Had two top-25s and four cuts made in six starts during the second half of the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica season. Finished T14 at the Mexico Open in October and T18 at the Ecuador Open in September.

Before joining PGA TOUR Latinoamérica played on the eGolf Tour, the Swingthought Tour and the West Florida Tour.
tourBios.personal: Attended Saint Stephen's Episcopal School in Florida... Has two brothers, one of them is his twin... Sea Island, GA is his favorite vacations spot... Favorite country in Latin America is Chile... Jack Nicklaus, Sam Snead and Tiger Woods would round out his dream foursome... Twitter name is @mscottlamb... Instagram name is @scottlamb90
